channel.title: DeathlySouls, RECENTLY RESTARTED BACK UP | FIGHT PITS | ECONOMY | PKING
channel.description:
[URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/branddonrulesmofos/media/zsohtf.png.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac268/branddonrulesmofos/zsohtf.png[/img][/URL] Recently started back up 562 Server! Come Check us out!
Forum - http://www.deathlysouls.org/forum.php Client Download - http://deathlysouls.org/index.php?pageid=dl Webclient -
Features - Fight Pits - Great Economy - Nex to be added in next week! - Great Skilling - Friendly Staff/Players - 100% Working Highscores - Duel fully coded for Staking! - Dicing added! - Every Skill except RC AND Dung[Which will be added later] - Full screen client - Great xp rates for skilling - Fast xp rate for leveling up combat stats - Clan chat with lots of options and a permanent CC for help! - Summoning fully working! - Great shops - Comp Cape Added! - Great Pking[Switching is great]
Heres some pictures. [URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/branddonrulesmofos/media/338aa39e-4da2-4ac4-b3af-c3197d9efc7a.jpg.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac268/branddonrulesmofos/338aa39e-4da2-4ac4-b3af-c3197d9efc7a.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/branddonrulesmofos/media/pits.png.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac268/branddonrulesmofos/pits.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/branddonrulesmofos/media/9280_9947.png.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac268/branddonrulesmofos/9280_9947.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/branddonrulesmofos/media/31.png.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac268/branddonrulesmofos/31.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/branddonrulesmofos/media/84_9.png.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac268/branddonrulesmofos/84_9.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: DeathlySouls, RECENTLY RESTARTED BACK UP | FIGHT PITS | ECONOMY | PKING

item.description:
@wiqs wrote:

[URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/branddonrulesmofos/media/zsohtf.png.html][/URL]
Recently started back up 562 Server!
Come Check us out!

Forum - http://www.deathlysouls.org/forum.php
Client Download - http://deathlysouls.org/index.php?pageid=dl
Webclient -

Features

  • Fight Pits
  • Great Economy
  • Nex to be added in next week!
  • Great Skilling
  • Friendly Staff/Players
  • 100% Working Highscores
  • Duel fully coded for Staking!
  • Dicing added!
  • Every Skill except RC AND Dung[Which will be added later]
  • Full screen client
  • Great xp rates for skilling
  • Fast xp rate for leveling up combat stats
  • Clan chat with lots of options and a permanent CC for help!
  • Summoning fully working!
  • Great shops
  • Comp Cape Added!
  • Great Pking[Switching is great]

Heres some pictures.
